Schema.Comment: The schema version table stores the current version of the database schema. Implementations are expected to query this table on connecting to the database in order to ensure that the calling code is compatible with the tables in the database.
Schema.Statement:
CREATE TABLE schema_version ( version_lock INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 1, version_application_id TEXT NOT NULL, version_number INTEGER NOT NULL,
CONSTRAINT check_lock_primary PRIMARY KEY (version_lock),
CONSTRAINT check_lock_locked CHECK (version_lock = 1) ) -- [jooq ignore start] STRICT -- [jooq ignore stop]

CREATE TABLE servers ( s_id TEXT NOT NULL, s_remote_address TEXT NOT NULL, s_port INTEGER NOT NULL, s_tls INTEGER NOT NULL, s_message_size_limit INTEGER NOT NULL
-- [jooq ignore start] , CONSTRAINT servers_primary_key PRIMARY KEY (s_id) -- [jooq ignore stop] ) -- [jooq ignore start] STRICT -- [jooq ignore stop]

CREATE TABLE agents ( a_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, a_name TEXT NOT NULL, a_key_algo TEXT NOT NULL, a_key_public TEXT NOT NULL, a_key_private TEXT NOT NULL ) -- [jooq ignore start] STRICT -- [jooq ignore stop]
-- [jooq ignore start] CREATE UNIQUE INDEX agents_name_unique ON agents (a_name) -- [jooq ignore stop]
-- [jooq ignore start] CREATE UNIQUE INDEX agents_key_unique ON agents (a_key_algo, a_key_public, a_key_private) -- [jooq ignore stop]

CREATE TABLE agent_servers ( as_agent INTEGER NOT NULL, as_server TEXT NOT NULL
-- [jooq ignore start] , CONSTRAINT agent_servers_server_exists FOREIGN KEY (as_server) REFERENCES servers (s_id),
CONSTRAINT agent_servers_agent_exists FOREIGN KEY (as_agent) REFERENCES agents (a_id) -- [jooq ignore stop] ) -- [jooq ignore start] STRICT -- [jooq ignore stop]
-- [jooq ignore start] CREATE UNIQUE INDEX agent_servers_unique ON agent_servers (as_agent) -- [jooq ignore stop]
